title: Phone not powering on
content: Phone not powering on charger I tried holding the power button for over 60 seconds I also tried holding the power button and the volume down button for over 60 seconds I tried charging the phone for over 3 hours still didn't work I tried multiple cables still don't work I tried to see if there is any dust in the Power port didn't have and there's no damaged to the phone just powered off this morning when I was watching some YouTube
